scripts.dev:watch: NODE_ENV=development parcel build ../src/index.html --dist-dir ./dev --no-cache && NODE_ENV=development webpack watch --mode=development
scripts.build:pre: npm run build:client && npm run build:app
scripts.build:test: npm run build:pre && electron-builder build --mac --dir && rm -r pre_build
scripts.build:only: npm run build:pre && electron-builder build --mac --win --publish never && rm -r pre_build
scripts.deploy: npm run build:pre && electron-builder build --mac --win --publish always && rm -r pre_build
scripts.increment-version: versiony package.json --patch && git add . && git commit -m 'new version' && git push
scripts.save: git add . && git commit -m 'save state' && git push
